name: Hallween
description: This is a 4 level collection from Doomer's House of Carnage. They are octoplex.wad, nyosix.wad, nyoface.wad, and peer.wad I've added some tunes from John Carpenter's movie "Halloween", "BeetleJuice", & "The Addams Family", as well as some sounds I grabbed from Quake. It was put together to reap some Halloween Havoc.
